actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by Senate employees and representation by Senate Legal Counsel.

summary.text: Authorizes: (1) Barbara Riehle and John Seggerman, Senate employees who work for Senator John Chafee, to provide deposition testimony in the case of Barnstead Broadcasting Corporation and BAF Enterprises, Inc. v. Offshore Broadcasting Corporation, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted; and (2) the Senate Legal Counsel to represent them in connection with such deposition testimony.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by Senate employees and representation by Senate Legal Counsel.
